docs.lead_paragraph: ON these pages today are told the stories of the Hundred Neediest Cases of New York City. They are the stories of neighbors of yours -- good people overwhelmed by circumstances, even as you, except for the turn of fortune, might also have been overwhelmed. On their behalf at this Christmas season, The New York Times makes its forty-second annual appeal.

headline.main: NEW YORK'S 100 NEEDIEST CASES; FORTY-SECOND ANNUAL APPEAL

keywords.value: HUNDRED NEEDIEST CASES (A FUND COLLECTED ANNUALLY BY THE NY TIMES FOR 7 BENEVOLENT ORGNS)
